cab.content: SECRETBATTLE SITUATION^EVENING - August 6th 1918.** (&) French Front. The situation generally Isunchanged0 In spite of enemy counter attacks, the French have maintained their positions an the Worth Bank of the VESLE, except in the neighbourhood of JONCHERY where they have made a slight withdrawal to the south bank.(k) British Front. This morning the enemy made a local attack astride the BRAY - CORBIE ROAD and succeeded in gaining a footing in part of our line.ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS, There is nothing to report.General Staff,\Y-vr Office, S.W.I. fitli August., 1918. IssWo at 6.5 p.m.
